mutants.original_line: vowelsList = [word for word in words if word[0] in vowels]
mutants.mutated_line: vowelsList = [word for word in words if word[0] not in vowels]

mutants.original_line: consonantsList = [word for word in words if word[0] not in vowels]
mutants.mutated_line: consonantsList = [word for word in words if word[0] in vowels]

mutants.mutated_line: vowelsList = [word for word in words if word[1] in vowels]

mutants.mutated_line: vowelsList = [word for word in words if word[-1] in vowels]

mutants.mutated_line: vowelsList = [word for word in words if word[1] in vowels]

mutants.original_line: consonantsList = [word for word in words if word[0] not in vowels]
